radiographic_examinations.findings: The imaged lung bases are clear. The liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions. The spleen is mildly enlarged. The appendix is thickened to a diameter of 1.2 cm with a thick, hyperemic wall and surrounding fat stranding. No evidence of perforation. Scattered diverticula are seen along the large bowel without evidence of diverticulitis. No acute bony changes are identified.
